name: GamesJam2022Team7
description:
Game is about the Joy of the Ride an infinite runner with obstacles, coin collection as well as possible world distance reached. 

- Game is designed from the inspiration of Flappy Bird / Jetpack Joy Ride.

Current Setting of the Game:

Currently the game is not finished and might still need work for it with menus, settings, more obstacles and more things within the world to happen something in the lines of randomizer when obstacles spawn how many spawns as well as coins should be from 5 to 30 total in a row or in some sort of shapes which will and might be added later down the line within the development continuity.

Special Thanks for people showing Up for a team of 9:

  • Jake
  • Anais
